Question: This person began to build himself a new home, which he called Taliesin, by May 1911.
Hints: The only realized skyscraper designed by this person is the Price Tower, a 19-story tower in Bartlesville, Oklahoma.
With Corwin gone, this person moved out of the Schiller Building and into the nearby and newly completed Steinway Hall Building.
Now the home of the ____ Foundation and archives, it continues today as the site of the ____ School of Architecture.
